summary: The document is a declassified record under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, detailing information about Osvaldo RELOVA, identified as the First Secretary of the Cuban Embassy in Canada. It includes personal details about RELOVA, his movements, and his activities, suggesting his involvement in intelligence or political activities. The document also mentions his physical description and hints at his political leanings, describing him as a new Communist who aspires to be more than Marx.
key_findings: Osvaldo RELOVA was the First Secretary of the Cuban Embassy in Canada.
RELOVA was involved in activities that suggest intelligence or political operations.
The document provides a detailed physical description of RELOVA.
RELOVA is described as a new Communist with ambitions beyond those of Marx.
The document was classified as SECRET with no foreign dissemination, indicating its sensitive nature.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act
